verses.verse: "But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6810>those<s%> <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I <S%H7832>mock<s%> me, <S%H834>Whose<s%> fathers I <S%H1>disdained<s%> to <S%H3988>put<s%> with the <S%H7896>dogs<s%> of my <S%H3611>flock.<s%>
<S%H1571>"Indeed,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> [good was] the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%> to me? <S%H3624>Vigor<s%> had perished from them.
"From <S%H2639>want<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> they are <S%H1565>gaunt<s%> Who <S%H6207>gnaw<s%> the <S%H6723>dry<s%> ground by <S%H570>night<s%> in <S%H9585>waste<s%> and <S%H4875>desolation,<s%>
Who <S%H6998>pluck<s%> <S%H4408>mallow<s%> by the <S%H7880>bushes,<s%> And whose <S%H3899>food<s%> is the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H7574>broom<s%> <S%H7574>shrub.<s%>
"They are <S%H1644>driven<s%> from the <S%H9073>community;<s%> They <S%H7321>shout<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them as [against] a <S%H1590>thief,<s%>
So that they <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H6178>dreadful<s%> <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> In <S%H2356>holes<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth<s%> and of the <S%H3710>rocks.<s%>
<S%H996>"Among<s%> the <S%H7880>bushes<s%> they <S%H5101>cry<s%> out; <S%H8478>Under<s%> the <S%H2738>nettles<s%> they are <S%H5596>gathered<s%> <S%H5596>together.<s%>
<S%H1121>"Fools,<s%> <S%H5036><s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1121>those<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> a <S%H8034>name,<s%> They were <S%H5217>scourged<s%> from the <S%H776>land.<s%>
"And <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> their <S%H5058>taunt,<s%> I have even <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4405>byword<s%> to them.
"They <S%H8581>abhor<s%> me [and] <S%H7368>stand<s%> <S%H7368>aloof<s%> from me, And they do not <S%H2820>refrain<s%> from <S%H7536>spitting<s%> at my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Because<s%> He has <S%H6605>loosed<s%> His <S%H9199>bowstring<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me, They have <S%H7971>cast<s%> <S%H7971>off<s%> the <S%H7448>bridle<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

"On the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> their <S%H6526>brood<s%> <S%H6965>arises;<s%> They <S%H7971>thrust<s%> aside my <S%H7272>feet<s%> and <S%H5549>build<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me their <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H343>destruction.<s%>
"They <S%H5420>break<s%> up my <S%H9350>path,<s%> They <S%H3276>profit<s%> from my <S%H1942>destruction,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> one <S%H5826>restrains<s%> them.
"As [through] a <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%> they <S%H857>come,<s%> <S%H8478>Amid<s%> the <S%H9585>tempest<s%> they <S%H1556>roll<s%> on.

<S%H1091>"Terrors<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, They <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5082>honor<s%> as the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And my <S%H3444>prosperity<s%> has <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> like a <S%H5645>cloud.<s%>
"And <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8210>poured<s%> out <S%H5921>within<s%> me; <S%H3117>Days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have <S%H270>seized<s%> me.
"At <S%H3915>night<s%> it <S%H5365>pierces<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, And my <S%H6207>gnawing<s%> [pains] <S%H7901>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7901>rest.<s%>
"By a <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3581>force<s%> my <S%H3830>garment<s%> is <S%H2664>distorted;<s%> It <S%H247>binds<s%> me about as the <S%H6310>collar<s%> of my <S%H3801>coat.<s%>
"He has <S%H3384>cast<s%> me into the <S%H2563>mire,<s%> And I have <S%H4911>become<s%> <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
"I <S%H7768>cry<s%> out to Thee for <S%H7768>help,<s%> but Thou dost not <S%H6030>answer<s%> me; I <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, and Thou dost <S%H995>turn<s%> Thy <S%H995>attention<s%> against me.
"Thou hast <S%H2015>become<s%> <S%H393>cruel<s%> to me; With the <S%H6108>might<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> Thou dost <S%H7852>persecute<s%> me.
"Thou dost <S%H5375>lift<s%> me up to the <S%H7307>wind<s%> [and] cause me to <S%H7392>ride;<s%> And Thou dost <S%H4127>dissolve<s%> me in a <S%H8663>storm.<s%>
"For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou wilt <S%H7725>bring<s%> me to <S%H4194>death<s%> And to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H389>"Yet<s%> does not one in a <S%H5856>heap<s%> of <S%H5856>ruins<s%> <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out [his] <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> in his <S%H6365>disaster<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H7769>cry<s%> out for <S%H7769>help<s%>?
"Have I not <S%H1058>wept<s%> for the one whose <S%H3117>life<s%> is <S%H7186>hard<s%>? Was not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5701>grieved<s%> for the <S%H34>needy<s%>?
<S%H3588>"When<s%> I <S%H6960>expected<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> then <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> When I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> then <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H935>came.<s%>
"I am <S%H7570>seething<s%> <S%H4578>within,<s%> and <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1826>relax;<s%> <S%H3117>Days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> <S%H6923>confront<s%> me.
"I <S%H1980>go<s%> about <S%H6937>mourning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> comfort; I <S%H6965>stand<s%> up in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> [and] <S%H7768>cry<s%> out for <S%H7768>help.<s%>
"I have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H8565>jackals,<s%> And a <S%H7453>companion<s%> of <S%H1323>ostriches.<s%> <S%H3284><s%>
"My <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7835>turns<s%> <S%H7835>black<s%> on me, And my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2787>burn<s%> with <S%H2721>fever.<s%>
"Therefore my <S%H3658>harp<s%> is <S%H1961>turned<s%> to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> And my <S%H5748>flute<s%> to the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of those who <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
